_description: St Katherine’s charm for banishing despair (in Gesta Romanorum) — four lines

BLAdd9066.Transcription:
ffoule fende away thou fleecriste with his blode he hathe bought me
                    of his blodethe crowne was reddeflee thou foule fende that is thy
                    dede
BLAdd9066.Editions:
Herrtage,  Sidney John Hervon,
                        ed.  
             The Early English Version of the Gesta Romanorum.
EETS
         e.s. 33 (1879); repr. 1962: 404.
